verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents, of David.) I was glad<WH8055> when they said<WH559> to me, "Let us go<WH1980> to the house<WH1004> of the Lord.<WH3068>"
Our feet<WH7272> are standing<WH5975> Within your gates,<WH8179> O Jerusalem,<WH3389>
Jerusalem,<WH3389> that is built<WH1129> As a city<WH5892> that is compact<WH2266> together;<WH9191>

To which<WH8033> the tribes<WH7626> go<WH5927> up, even the tribes<WH7626> of the Lord<WH3050> – An ordinance<WH5715> for Israel<WH3478> – To give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to the name<WH8034> of the Lord.<WH3068>
For there<WH8033> thrones<WH3678> were set<WH3427> for judgment,<WH4941> The thrones<WH3678> of the house<WH1004> of David.<WH1732>
Pray<WH7592> for the peace<WH7965> of Jerusalem:<WH3389> "May they prosper<WH7951> who love<WH157> you.
"May peace<WH7965> be within your walls,<WH2426> And prosperity<WH7962> within your palaces.<WH759>"
For the sake<WH4616> of my brothers<WH251> and my friends,<WH7453> I will now<WH4994> say,<WH1696> "May peace<WH7965> be within you."
For the sake<WH4616> of the house<WH1004> of the Lord<WH3068> our God<WH430> I will seek<WH1245> your good.<WH9185>
